content.detailedDescription:
A light in the sky caught my eye.  it was round in shape; appeared to have various intensity. moved very slow almost like floating. stopped, hovered for a few seconds then shot up rapidly then stopped and hovered again for a few seconds.  it then started to float away in the same direction it was previously moving it.  
oddest and eeriest thing i've ever seen.  thought process moved from plane, to shooting star, to meteor then realized that it was just moving way to slow.  i wouldn't be normally reading too much into this but it stopped and hovered, shot up like a rocket then stopped and hovered again...That's when i knew i was seeing some well outside of the norm.  
by the time i reached for my cell to take video i was only able to film about 30 seconds of it floating away.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A light in the sky caught my eye.  it was round in shape; appeared to have various intensity. moved very slow almost like floating. a light in the sky caught my eye.  it was round in shape; appeared to have various intensity. moved very slow almost like f

content.detailedDescription:
October 13th in kalispell montana.  friends ranch ��� cloudy night  4 am to 5:30am.

woke up just before  4 am.  looked outside from the camper bed i was laying in from the window at my head.  i saw lights moving in the sky i moved and saw across the road up on the top of the cliffs across the road from the  ranch. i flipped over and watched the hill top with all the small orbs of light. some moved quickly  in a line most were kind of stationary.   there where many hundreds of them.  i blinked my eyes and pinched myself to make sure  i was not seeing things.  i changed positions many times looking out the window. they started moving all over

some of the orbs came down the side of the cliffs and across the yard.  there were misty floating images going across the lawn outside the camper i have been staying in. the misty things almost had a human form. they were lower than the orbs closer to the ground hiding just above it. 

some orbs moved quickly like a falling star but sideways.  one of them did a circle. i was amazed at how many i saw.

then i noticed a red beam of light rising from the top left cliff (from where i was facing) toward the sky it lasted perhaps 40 seconds and it was gone.

i got out of bed and walked outside to make sure i  was not seeing stars.  no it was a cloudy night.  stood in the yard watching the orbs move all around and the misty floating images move across the yard.  there had to be 35 to 50 of them.

went back in and watched from the window.
i watched this for about an hour and a half total and became so very tired i had to close my eyes.  woke up in the morning and typed a report.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hundreds of orbs and misty like objects

content.detailedDescription: While driving east over the park blvd bridge my husband and i saw four bright red lights to the north slowly flying southward. they travelled as a group but independently, at slightly different speeds and spreading out then closer together. their altitude was about 1000 feet or more and there was no sound and their speed seemed about the same as a small private plane. after they passed overhead one disappeared, then two more went out of view. all of a sudden the last one darted off at a high speed, faster then i have ever seen something fly.
content.summary: My husband and i witnessed 4 bright red spherical objects over the park blvd bridge in indian shores.

content.detailedDescription:
Missouri.  iron county -  woke up at about 3am there were lights moving around the ceiling of my room. small quarter- fifty cent piece size lights zooming around my bedroom.  there were between 50 to 75 of them moving all over the ceiling area hovering and zooming about 5 to 7 inches from  the ceiling.

i sat up and rubbed my eyes.  pinched my arm. watched them for about 25 minutes and then fell asleep- more like blacked out.

i awoke a little while later opened my eyes. i seemed to be laying on a metal table.  light shining on me indirectly.  there were 3 beings two on the right side and one on my left side. it felt as though one was near my right shoulder just our of sight.  they looked at me and i blacked out again.

that was it.   i woke up feeling that i had been a part of something but not sure what.  a few months later i saw a meteor fall in the near by woods  one night- august.

told a friend and was told that one of your friends had an implant put in her arm and you could see it.  i was curious and made arrangements so our paths would cross to see her implant.  it looked like a small rectangular box protruding from her forearm.  i asked her about it she said she was not sure how or what it is there and said she did not mind it.  i asked if she ever had it looked at she said "no why"  i thought that was odd then realized she could be programed to accept it.  weird.
content.summary: First- orbs  roughly 75 in bed room. later woke up on table with 3 greys looking down at me

content.detailedDescription: Riding my bicycle  south on germantown road.
content.summary: Hover craft never landed !

content.detailedDescription:
I was up in pa. and a few freinds and i were just outside enjoying the clear night sky
as i was looking up i noticed a egg shaped white object around 500 feet or less above
i said outload oh my god look at that in the sky my friend said what is it can it be a 
a ufo i said look at the way its moveing it floated in a very wide arch but so gracefully
and the light was very bright as if it were glowing from the inside ought with a blue light tate we had seen through the lines in it weired i have to draw it my friend lost interest but i felt as if it wanted me me to notice it i felt as if i wasnt supposed to stop looki.G at it. that night i had a dream that something wass in my room and i couldnt move or scream weird.
content.summary: We were just outside looking at the stars a orb shaped  ufo flew over so slow a.D softly  then changed direction  in a very wide arch type pattern  and shot off  it was  a wow  moment for usi

content.detailedDescription: Eu sempre pesquisei de tudo para antes de dizer n��o acredito pelo fato de outros estarem falando , eu ter minha pr��pria opini��o. eu nunca via nada no c��u nem em lugar nenhum , s�� oque todos falavam e por mostrarem provas passei a acreditar meio desacreditando ate que eu e minha esposa no quarto vendo tv de madrugada sozinhos em casa , fui na sala e saiu 2 bolas de energia de traz da tv da sala. elas eram do tamanho de bolas de basquetes , brilhavam continuamente azul e branco a ponto de machucar a vista. as 2 naves em forma de bolas de energia ficaram paradas a nossa frente por 5 minutos , eu e minha esposa n��o sab��amos oque fazer nem oque achar se era fantasma ou sei la oque , apertamos as m��os um do outro ela correu para o quarto , e elas come��aram a ir em dire����o da porta , eu fui la abrir a porta e elas sa��ram da minha casa para o quintal , ficaram mi olhando mas de longe por 1 minuto e simplesmente sa��ram para o c��u em uma velocidade t��o grande deixando um rastro incr��vel e eu pensei , isso com certeza n��o e um fantasma ,, depois todos os dias eu ia la e nunca mas apareceu mas eu acho que estava sendo observado e se foce hoje eu abriria um sorriso e diria ola , em vez de colocar tanto medo, eu n��o falo disso com ningu��m e minha esposa que n��o acreditava em nada passou a abrir mas a cabe��a para o mundo que bom poder escrever isso aqui ...
content.summary: 2 naves do tamanho de bolas de basquete brilhantes azul e branco frente a frente de mim e minha esposa

content.detailedDescription: On or about march 27, 2014 i was sitting in my back patio observing the low storm clouds brewing, when i went inside to get my cell phone to take photos of the brewing storm. i took the photos and tried to post them on face book to share with my family back home, but couldn't get an internet connection. i continued to observe the growing storm then decided to go in and tried again to post the photos still no internet connection. basically i forgot about the pictures, until monday night april 7, 2014. i was going through the photos my husband and i had taken on post at fort hood that afternoon to delete the ones that weren't too clear or just bad photos, when i came across the photos of the hail storm days before, as i was going through them i noticed something and zoomed to get a better look, when i saw a dark object in the clouds and said "what is that" there were no planes nor did i hear any when i took the pictures then i realized "that can't be a plane" again i thought there were no planes nor helicopters nor did i hear any. i ran out of the room looking for my husband and showed him the photos.
content.summary: I took random photos of the brewing storm without knowing i took a photo of an object i know was not there when i took picture.

content.detailedDescription: I have observed these events several times, my description is for the evening of april 9, 2014.  observed what first appeared to be stars, then i noticed that the bright spheres which seem to be in orbit (because planes fly around the area of the sighting i assume they do not see them or are bothered by them). these are not planets and are not stars. the objects appear in pairs, they appear to move with each other sometimes as if they are connected, or, just staying in a fixed relation to each other. also one in each pair is usually brighter than the other.  the individual objects move from side to side several degrees and have also appeared to have risen up in straight lines or zig zags again moving several degrees.  there were 3 pairs of these objects.  they appear when the sun goes down and can no longer be seen when the sun is fully risen.  this particular sighting started at 10pm and was last seen at 6am.  these objects are present every night and usually appear in the same area of the sky.  they are not airplanes, lots of planes fly overhead to compare them to, they are not helicopters.  there is no sound that one would hear from planes and helicopters.  i first observed these objects in 2010 and have seen them countless times in manitoba and ontario.  light pollution decreases the ability to see them so it is best from a more rural area, however i have observed them in a city setting as well. i suggest looking up no matter where you are and look for stars that look out of place and just watch to see if they move in an unusual fashion. my hypothesis is that these objects are everywhere.  when you see one it will be there all night so if you have a good quality video camera it is a good opportunity to film if you want to.
content.summary: Bright star like objects that seem to be in pairs and blink various colours

content.detailedDescription: I was stood at bus stop waiting for my lift to work at the time,  it was about 5:30 in the morning and still very dark. i noticed a light in the sky that acted oddly it moved at varying speeds and changed direction suddenly at times it just seemed to stop suddenly and then continue, watched this for a few minutes in total amazement, all of a sudden 2 military jets flew over my head towards the object, as they covered half the distance between me and the object it rapidly changed direction and moved away from jets and then accelerated so quickly was gone in a flash,  at that both jets turned round and headed back in a westerly direction.
content.summary: Glowing object white blue colour,  east of my location

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from a party. i turned onto grabill road i saw the object over the town then flew over the lumberyard in grabill where it began to lower a smaller orange orb down to the ground. while another orange orb ascended to the larger red orb. the electronics in my vehicle had failed except for my cell phone. i have seen this orb before for only a few seconds before it disappeared behind the trees. this time i have picture proof of it. i would like to send you the pics of it i took while i was pulled to the side of the road. before and after the sighting i spotted a helicopter with spotlights looking for it. the orb disappeared behind the trees. my car started up. i went home pale as a ghost terrified and excited at the same time.
content.summary: Orb has been in area before this time i have actual pictures. it hovered over town.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: In hotel regente in benidorm 18/03 2014 spain.Was on balcony having cigarette looking at sky .Was in built up area,was looking at stars when i noticed what i thought was much bigger star/and thought that looks close .Then  the light shot across sky over the sea, my view was obstructed by 2 or 3 high buildings ..My first thought was a shooting star at the speed it travelled ,then it stopped and shot back across sky and dissappeared  ,,defo not any aircraft ive seen that can travel at that speed and stop like that ..Thought it may of been some kind of laser light ,,but checked the next 7 nights at the same time ,but nothing besides it did look solid  ,,strange
content.summary: White light stationary .Shot off at great speed, stopped dead returned along simular line

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a church league softball game with my family and friends shooting some footage of our son for a highlight video. it was about 45 minutes past sundown and i was standing on the first base side of the field, about ten feet past the bag talking to a friend named cathy. during a break in the action i turned to talk to cathy when, to my right, i noticed a small, bright, reddish light moving around and hovering in the sky at tree top height. it just looked out of place in context to what else was there, namely homes, trees and no lights. because i had never seen anything like it before - it got bigger and smaller and duller and brighter while moving kind of zig-zaggy - i turned the video camera at it to try and document the "object" but it blinked off. moments later it blinked back on, at which time i began to record it. it was definitely odd, and at first i had no idea what it could be. but then i had the feeling that not only was it watching things, but that it was not man-made. if the truth be told it felt like an et eye-in-the-sky, monitoring what was around its position. it had no "body" or shell to it. it was a roaming ball of reddish light that changed shapes, colors, sizes as it blinked off and back on every few moments while it turned left and right and hovered up and down between the trees which is where we lost sight of it. 
i tried to include the video in this e-mail but i was unable to figure out how to do it.  because i'm not sure if you'd have any interest in our sighting i will just submit the report sans the video, however, if you request it i can ask my sons to help me send it to you.
content.summary: I observed a tree top high hovering reddish ball of light with a friend that was just over a hundred feet or so away.

content.detailedDescription:
Event took place about 9:40pm ct, it was dark outside with a bright waxing moon, no clouds to speak of. i had just arrived home from the store, since i had been driving in the dark my eyes were somewhat acclimated to the night sky. before going in the house for the night i took this opportunity to star gaze as i often do, it relaxes and inspires me.

i looked at the bright constellations in front of me, bootes and the big dipper were very prominent. i fixed my gaze above them, straight up 90 degrees into the sky as i do to look for shooting stars. there between bootes and the big dipper my eyes fell onto a faint grouping of stars, at 80 degrees, thought hey that's not where pleiades is supposed to be...Then i saw it was moving and triangular in shape, the size of a penny at arms length, a 90 degree triangle with a row of singular lights on the leading edges. the lights pulsed, they would become very dim and then pulse brighter randomly after 5 to 15 seconds. this craft was traveling nw across the sky at a moderate speed but after 1 minute i lost it behind the trees. i tried very hard to count the blueish-white lights, i think i saw 9 or 11 total, with one on the leading front center point followed by 4 or 5 on the edges behind it. it seemed very high up but it was impossible to judge the distance or size. 

aircraft are often seen flying over my house as i live 25 miles from the minneapolis/st paul international airport, also 5 miles from the smaller flying cloud airport. this event was so different from a normal airplane, the way it looked and the lack of sound.

well this was my first ufo sighting, being 50 years old. i knew it would be just a matter of time before i saw anything unusual in the sky. the feelings i had about this were similar to sighting a rare bird, i will say this triangle seemed so far away i didn't feel threatened by it, just curious.
content.summary: Triangle ufo seen flying over shakopee mn  (25 miles sw of minneapolis)

content.detailedDescription:
I had just finished training at porky's gym (address given above). as i approach my vehicle i notice in the distance (1-2k feet away & about 300feet above tree top level) a blue orb traveling at about helicopter speeds. i pause to try and make sense of what i am seeing but i quickly dismiss helicopter, plane or balloon. i then notice the orb changes colors, blue, white and neon green. i also see the orb change directions from south to north... i get in my car and decide to drive a bit forward where i can have a better view. at this point the object descended below tree top view causing me to lose sight of the object. i decided to wait and prepare my cell phone video camera just in case it ascended back to where i can see and catch it on video.

about 45 seconds later the object did just that and i was able to capture video of it traveling on a north trajectory. in plain eye sight the orb was really bright and a lot larger than what my cell phone video shows. frustrated that the video was not enough evidence i decided to try and get under the object to find out what this thing was.

i put my car in drive and proceed to follow the object at this point the object switched trajectory back south and descended into the neighborhood it appeared to have ascended from just before i shot the video. i followed the object and made a left turn on 122nd ave and 24st and there it was on my left hand side (drive side) the object was slightly above tree level and this time took a north west trajectory causing it to fly above my vehicle. i was in amazement as the bright orb traveled above my vehicle. 

at that point i was able to clearly see the object.
*it was bright neon green.
*so bright my eyes squinted as if staring into a headlight.
*i noticed what looked like a silver rod in the middle of the object.
*my car window was lowered but no sound was heard as it traveled about 200 feet above my car.


at that point i had a smile on my face and decided to head to the supermarket before they close on me and i was satisfied with what i saw.

i was satisfied in the sense that i know it was not a helicopter or something i can easily explain. i am 90% sure i can rule out man made drone with lighting attached to it because of the vast amount of distance it traveled.
content.summary: Strong, glowing orb covering large distances in little time.

content.detailedDescription: Walking home from grocery store noticed a chemtrail circle around the sun.  thought it interesting so took pictures with cell phone camera.  the sun was so bright i couldn't tell by looking at my phone if i had pictures of the chemtrail or not until i got home a few minutes later.  i took three pictures.  in picture one the chemtrail is plainly visible around the sun as well as a plane making a trail.  i'm not sure if the big white round flash is anything but there does appear to be something white barely visible behind the power line.  in picture two the white object is clearly seen straight above the tree.  in picture three the white object is now on the outside of the chemtrail and off to the left of the tree (the tree is in the bottom right of the photo).  picture three still has the plane visible.  the picture i labeled "alternate" was taken by someone unknown to me.  i saw the picture on a local facebook site.  apparently the person was also taking a picture of the chemtrail and had no interest in the white object.  i posted a response to their picture but no one answered.  i made two enlargements of the object.
content.summary: Appeared near a chemtrail, first in one area then in another area then a yet another

content.detailedDescription: February night i was with my friend drinking coffe out in the porch. it had snowed in the past few days but that night was a perfect clear sky full moon.While we are talking out of nowhere this triangle shape object with three dim lights appeared at a extreamly low altitude at about 25 to 35 feet over the north side of the house. it was approximatly 50 ft. in diameter.  it slowly passed over the house .At the moment it went by i looked at my friend and he told me i told they where real. it was a very scary moment.  i have seen details on the craft witch i do not dare describe in the public. this area of fitchburg ma. is a ufo hot spot.
content.summary: Object hovered

content.detailedDescription: i am visiting puerto vallarta.  i woke up early this morning and walked out on to the terrace of where we are staying which has an un-obstructed view of the ocean bay. i actually came outside to have a cigarette, i noticed that the sky was pitch black and you could really see all the stars.  i noticed an object which was clearly visible in a rounded boomerang shape with pointed tips and a pointed center piece, it was slowly and by slowly i mean barely drifting very clearly in front of me from south to north. i really couldn't believe what i was seeing. it appeared luminescent like the light source was moving around the bottom of it kind of like a jelly fish type glow and movement of light. it was dead silent but more than that just the way it exhibited zero drag to its movement kind of gave it an even more silent type feeling. to say it was levitating almost accounts for the sound of what i would normally feel would be associated with that act of levitation, if that makes sense. it was lighter than floating(?).  i could very clearly see the shape and edges of the craft as it was fairly close to me above the water. as the vessel(?) moved to the north without a sound or even a ripple in the air around it it went from this floating type of feeling to turning out very slowly towards the ocean and then all of a sudden zing! it shot out into the horizon so fast it was stunning. the whole event didn't last that long but i saw the shape of it and detail clearer than i can see a sailboat in the ocean today.  i ran to wake up my partner who was sleeping and was shaking so bad and my heart was beating so fast i couldn't even talk straight or barely move my legs properly to walk.  i had to be calmed down and take deep breaths before i could even begin to explain what i saw. my mind is still trying to make sense of this but i just can't. i'm asking myself was it a hallucination? i was very awake and fully functional but can the mind slip into a dream? i don't understand and feel very very rattled and scared to tell you the truth. i feel uneasy to tell anyone what i saw for fear of ridicule, and personally still in shock.
content.summary: Hovering but gliding like ice floating on smooth ice, no drag

content.detailedDescription:
We were at heyburn lake near sapulpa oklahoma, sitting aroung campfire
we took a photo of my son near the fire, we didnt see anything until we looked at the photo and there was a beam of light that seem to come from a lightning bolt or what looks like a web of lights, that stops on my sons shoulder and goes no further, with what looks like a small creature on his shoulder. when we zoomed in on the picture , what looked like a white l;ight is actually several lights in a row. my son seems to be affected physically and definately emoti0nally. once again we saw nothing , it was a clear night ther were no other campfires or light nearby.The photo which i am reluctant to reveal at this time but would be willing to subject it to testing. it is absolutly genuon. my son had three triangular markes on his back next day, really weird
content.summary: Beam of light

content.detailedDescription:
I was alone visiting the archeological site of teotihuacan in mexico on february the 1st, 2014. i was resting, sitting and leaning by the base of one step pyramid. i turned to see on my left side up to the sky when i noticed a shining dot far in the sky. i immediately turned on my nikon p500 camera and started shooting some pictures and the video i am sending you. the quality of this video is not that good, it was pretty hard to infocus the object due to the distance. the object was moving slowly in straight path, i noticed that for a few seconds the object slowed down (near stopping) and then continued its path smoothly till the moment i couldn't track it either with the camera or with naked eye, the object simply disappeared in the distance. i consider this a strange event because the altitude this object registered was similar to the supersonic crafts but it did not leave any trail at all and it was very round as an orb.

i like scanning the skies with my camera and my telescope, so i know pretty well the differences between and airplane, or any man-made aircrafts. this is the reason i am sending you this video and pictures. i hope you may identify what it was and eventually tell me if this object was just an aerostatic balloon or something like that.
content.summary: Object observed at great altitude, orb-like, silver shining, hovering and moving in straight path.

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up this morning (april 10th, 2014) at 3am.  i live in hewitt nj (in west milford).   i went downstairs to watch some television.  i went outside to catch some fresh air and to look at the stars.  to my left in the sky, i saw a very bright object...It looked liked two thing attached to each other, but i thought it was a result of looking through tree branches.

i went upstairs to my outdoor deck where i have a tree free view of the stars.  i found the object.  it was high in altitude. it was white-ish, with an orange-ish color. it looked like a baseball on top with a golf ball attached on the bottom.  it was not the color of the other stars. 

it was brighter than any object in the sky.  at first i thought it could be a planet, except it had two circular objects connected to each.

an airplane flew below it...Flashing lights, green, red and white.

it then began to shoot beams of light, laser like from its being.

it shot 1, 2 or 3 beams at a time.  never more than 3 at a time, and only from one side at a time.

on the left, it shot a 45 degree beam upwards.
on the left, it shot a two beams making a 90 degree angle; one up, the other down.

on the right, it shot a 45 degree angle.
on the right it shot two beams making a 90 degree angle.
on time it shot 3 beams with the 90 degree angle, and one at the center.

the beams/rays were 10-15 times the length of the larger circle.

after watching it for approximately 5 minutes, i went back in the house....It was cold, and i was not interested in having a "lost time" experience or getting probed by e.T.'s.

the object looked liked it was over waywayanda state park/clinton resovaire. (sp).

this is the first time in 48 years i can say i have seen a ufo.

i was a nyc prot. minister for 5 years.  i have been a nyc teacher for 14 years...And i swear this is what i saw.  i had no alcohol the day or night before.  

regarding feelings, at first it was, "i can't be seeing this."  then it was, "i am seeing a ufo."  i had no feeling of dread, mostly curiosity.  when the beams began changing, i was not sure if it was communicating with me or not, or if it was just doing what this ufo normally does.  after five minutes, i went back in...I was not interested in it possibly turning into an abduction story.  i locked all my doors, and crawled in my lazy boy and blanket to fall tried to fall asleep.

i do not have a video camera.  i have a digital camera, but felt it was so far away, it would have come out a blur.
content.summary: Early this morning,  i saw something that looked like a baseball on top with a golfball attached, very bright, shooting beams of light.

content.detailedDescription:
I live over by lake elizabeth & there are plenty of rumors about it being a "ufo hot spot" back in the day.
 one night i was pulling into the complex where i live & my boyfriend was driving. i noticed a very large "star' in the sky at first & it started moving. i looked up & there was a huge piece of metal with 2 rows of orange lights on the underneath of it with one blinking light. i knew it wasn't a plane because of just how low and somewhat slow it was moving, also it was moving in a straight line. me and my boyfriend followed it all the way to my house until he dropped me off. he continued to follow it, but, in the opposite direction it was originally traveling in. he said that he came around the mountain & it just disappeared. 
 after it happened, its almost as if it was a dream & it was so hard to remember. so i came inside & immediately drew a picture of the ufo. 
 it was the most surreal moment of my life.
content.summary: Large metal object. close to ground. quiet.

content.detailedDescription: At approx. 05:40 standing in my side door i observed a very bright object due west. the object was silent in the still morning air. after approx. 2 minutes, it began to move se slowly and without sound. i worked in aviation for 6 years and am familiar with flight patterns of both rotary and fixed wing aircraft. at first i thought an aircraft with landing lights, but as the object started to move se, the lights did not change as they would have if forward facing landing lights were the source. it was not a rotary wing craft as that would have been easily heard in the still morning air. the object continued its course se until it faded from view. i could only speculate on the altitude as 3000 feet. i used my door frame and neighbors roof as a fixed reference points during my observation. unfortunatly, i did not obtain video. i now keep a high def camcorder near the door.
content.summary: Light brighter than venus stationary then movins slowly to sw no sound

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 1:15am and i looked out of our window facing the west, noticed what 1st looked like a star flickering but seemed odd, retrieved binoculars and discovered it was golf ball shaped and flickering different colors hovering in the sky, last for about 25 minutes slowly moving west.
woke my husband up and he observed the same thing, while i was trying to find out who to contact i lost sight of it. my camera would not zoom in close enough to video or capture a photo of it.
content.summary: Looked out of my window facing w, saw golfball like object hovering and flashing different colors

content.detailedDescription: Stepped outside and looked up to see what appeared to be an extremely bright star, upon looking i could see that it was moving at a steady pace. it quickly, within a matter of seconds, brigtened extremely, and proceeded to vanish. no cloud cover, no trees or buildings in the way, it just vanished from sight as quickly as it had appeared. my immediate thought was "what the hell was that?"
content.summary: Bright, star like light, moving fast, brightened extremely and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my fianc�� were fishing on lake gilmer in an evening tournament. i felt an odd sensation that made me look up. we are in a flyway from the dallas area airports and there were several airplanes in the area. as i scanned the sky's i saw a starlike object that looked somewhat triangular in shape that was traveling at a high rate of speed with no flashing light. i told my fianc�� to take a look due to the speed. at that time we were both looking at it and it disappeared. we both got chills and started scanning the sky's when we saw another object just like the first. it flashed randomly then disappeared. about 1 second later it flashed very bright. we never saw it after that. we watched the sky's for 30 minutes and saw shooting stars and airplanes. these triangular object were not anything like airplanes in the area. they were as high or higher than the airplanes but 3 times faster.
content.summary: Starlike objects disappearing

content.detailedDescription: After working a late shift. i was at home getting ready to go to sleep at 2:15 am. i took the dogs outside to do their thing while having a smoke i suddenly looked directly up over my house and saw a classic v shaped ufo flying north in a straight line much like the stealth bomber would when doing fly overs for air force games . but much bigger.It was huge about the size of a neighborhood block.  i could make out a outline of a v with at least 3 big orange/red lights on the rear. no flashing lights. totally silent. it glided north towards the air force academy. before it was totally gone from view it looked liked it just popped out of sight. it was the most amazing thing i have ever seen.
content.summary: Huge v shaped with at least 3 red orange lights. flying north.

content.detailedDescription:
This is hearsay but a persistent story on a usaf base in missouri that controlled nuclear missiles, in 1968. there were supposedly multiple occurrences. it was told to me by someone whose job it was to provide security for the missiles. i am repeating what i was told and did not hear this first hand, witness anything or know the people involved. the person who told this to me also was not there during any event but because he worked in security, he knew the other men in security who were involved in these incidents and that is how he knew about it. this makes my knowledge second-hand. this is the story:

there were many missile sites with many alarms. a security team had to investigate whenever an alarm was tripped. they had to go no matter what time it was. usually it was nothing; an animal; debris; a local person. however at times, the security team leader would get on the radio all excited and reported a ufo at the missile site. i do not know what he reported exactly. lights? a craft? hovering? on the ground? but what is sure is that it must have been something very strange to make him call in all excited. these guys, although very young, were trying to be professional, were usually annoyed or slightly pissed and at 3, 4 or 5 am, they weren't getting too excited about much. also, many of them were aware of how something like that would be viewed and they did not want to see the base shrink. anyway, they'd call this in and described what they were seeing. the person on the other end of the radio was usually a sergeant who worked closely with them. there was one sergeant who became very interested in this and even when off duty, asked to be called whenever a ufo was called in. after the security team returned to base, they were taken away for debriefing. sometimes this interested sergeant got to them first. once they were removed, no one ever saw them again. since i did not know them and did not work alongside them i cannot verify this. i was also not aware of constant replacements coming in, but then this could very well go on without my being aware of it. according to the story, this happened pretty often, periodically, such as two a month, then skip a month or 6 weeks and then another incident, then skip two months, etc. like that, periodically but consistently. this story also maintains that these same 19 & 20 year old airmen first class and "buck" sergeants kept being sent out and no higher authority or stronger fire power or more sophisticated equipment sent out. of course there could have been some other response on the quiet but why wouldn't one of the security team members say, that someone else was also there to respond? was the person who told me this pulling my leg? he did not get a strong reaction from me. he did not try to tease me for listening. some of the guys came and told me other things because i think they saw me as someone who listened and maybe was a bit more sophisticated and a bit outside the box so to speak. this person was always serious when telling me about these incidents, he seemed concerned and we were alone. he put a lot of detail into the story, such as the interested sergeant who asked to be called. he named the guys who were taken away but since i did not know them, the names were meaningless to me. he tried to help me identify them and would say you know him, he's the one, blah, blah, but i couldn't place the guys he mentioned. could he have been fooling? of course. but my gut says he wasn't.
 when i learned that there have been other incidents in other parts of the country at different times of ufos reported over nuclear sites, such as in maine, i decided to submit this story.
content.summary: Ufos over nuclear missle sites

content.detailedDescription: We went out on our deck, which faces the backyard and is on the second floor.  it was a clear evening, no clouds with a waning moon. i was looking at the big dipper when i noticed a small star, or what i thought was a star close to the "ladle" when it started to move across the sky. i pointed it out to my husband, asking if he thought it was a plane. it was so far up and no visible flashing lights, as a plane would have, so the consensus was it wasn't one. we watched the object move across the sky, from the northeast to the southeast. also, the object moved too fast for a plane. we watched it progress across the sky for around three to four minutes, when it disappeared. i tried to see it through binoculars, but had lost sight of the object by the time i could get it into focus.
content.summary: Standing out on back yard deck, enjoying the evening sky, when we saw what we thought was  a star.

content.detailedDescription: i was running down to the gas station at about 8:45 pm for a few items when i noticed three very bright white lights in the sky. they appeared to be three distinct lights in a row close together and at first i thought it was three different objects but as i looked closer, it appeared to be three lights in a row on one object. i noticed that they were not moving, just  in one spot. the lights changed from white to having hints of orange light blended with the white. they did not pulsate or blink on and off, only changed color. this is what initially caught my attention as other aircraft have blinking lights. i stopped on the side of the road to take pictures with my iphone. after a few minutes of this i noticed some much smaller, dimmer group of red flashing lights (about 6-8 small lights) appeared and approached from above the first object. the red lights flashed very fast on and off and with a random pattern. as soon as it had reached directly over head of the orange and white lights they all started moving very quickly in the ne direction, and i attempted to take a few pics as the red lights approached and as they all moved away together. they were moving so fast that i only got one pic of them leaving. i have never observed anything like this in my life and i am familiar with the usual military aircraft that frequent the area due to fort bragg in neighboring fayetteville.
content.summary: Three bright lights stationary and then joined by another object with red flashing lights. all moved away at  fast speed.
